name: bear-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for interfacing with Bear's SQLite database using a hybrid sync-safe approach
long_description: This MCP server provides AI assistants with read and write access to Bear notes through a hybrid approach that safely reads directly from Bear's SQLite database while using Bear's URL scheme for write operations. Features include full-text search, tag management, note organization, performance caching, and comprehensive health monitoring.

tools.name: search_notes
tools.description: Search Bear notes using full-text search

tools.name: get_note
tools.description: Get a specific note by ID or title

tools.name: get_tags
tools.description: Get all tags or notes with specific tags

tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a new note in Bear

tools.name: trash_note
tools.description: Move a note to trash or restore from trash

tools.name: backup_notes
tools.description: Create a backup of Bear notes

tools.name: health_check
tools.description: Check the health status of the MCP server

bear_db_path.title: Bear Database Path
bear_db_path.description: Path to Bear's SQLite database file (usually ~/Library/Group Containers/9K33E3U3T4.net.shinyfrog.bear/Application Data/database.sqlite)

backup_dir.title: Backup Directory
backup_dir.description: Directory where note backups will be stored

log_level.description: Logging level for the MCP server
